lines.gurmukhi: 1 jyhw bIau qyhw Pl
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realised through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: sB dUM nIvI Driq hoie drgh AMdir imlI vfweI
lines.transliteration_english: Sabh Doon Neeveen Dharati Hoi Daragah Andari Milee Vadaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The earth is most humble and hence respected in the court of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: koeI gofY vwih hlu ko ml mUq kusUq krweI
lines.transliteration_english: Koee Godai Vaahi Halu Ko Mal Mootr Kousootr Karaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: One hoes it, other ploughs it and someone impures it by defecating it.

lines.gurmukhi: ilMib rsoeI ko krY coAw cMdnu pUj cVweI
lines.transliteration_english: Libi Rasoee Ko Karai Choaa Chandanu Pooji Charhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Plastering it one prepares kitchen over it and someone worships it by offering sandal sticks.

lines.gurmukhi: jyhw bIjY so luxY jyhw bIau qyhw Plu pweI
lines.transliteration_english: Jayhaa Beejai So Lounai Jayhaa Beeu Dayhaa Phalu Paaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: One reaps what one sows and receives the fruit of seeds offered to earth.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl shj Gru Awpu gvwie n Awpu gxweI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Sahaj Gharu Aapu Gavaai N Aapu Ganaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting stabilised in the innate nature gurmukhs receive the pleasure-fruits. Eschewing ego they never allow themselves to be counted anywhere.

lines.gurmukhi: jwgRq supn suKopqI aunmin mgn rhY ilvlweI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaagrat Soupan Soukhopatee Ounamani Magan Rahai Liv Laaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: They, in all the four stages - jagrat (conscious) svapan (dream), susupati (deep sleep or trance) and turiya (indetical with the supreme lord) - remain merged in the love of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gur sbdu kmweI ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Gur Sabadu Kamaaee ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: One accomplishes the word of the Guru in the company of saints.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 jl qoN aupdyS

Shabad OS B.translation: Lessons from water

lines.gurmukhi: DrqI AMdir jlu vsY jlu bhu rMgI rsI imlMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Dharatee Andari Jalu Vasai Jalu Bahu Rangeen Raseen Miladaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Water resides in the earth and mixes with all colours and saps.

lines.gurmukhi: ijau ijau koeI clwiedw nIvwN huie nIvwx clMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Jioun Jioun Koee Chalaaidaa Neevaan Hoi Neevaani Chaladaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As somebody goes on pushing it, it goes down and down.

lines.gurmukhi: DupY qqw hoie kY CwvYN TMFw hoie rhMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Dhoupai Tataa Hoi Kai Chhaavain Tdaddhaa Hoi Rahandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: It remains hot in sunshine and cold in the shade.

lines.gurmukhi: nwvxu jIvidAwN muieAwN pIqY swNiq sMqoKu hovMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Naavanu Jeevadiaan Muiaan Peetai Saanti Santokhu Hovandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Bathing, living, dying, drinking it always gives peace and satisfaction.

lines.gurmukhi: inrmlu krdw mYilAwN nIvY srvr jwie itkMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Niramalu Karadaa Mailiaan Neevai Saravar Jaai Tikandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: It makes impure ones pure and remains undisturbed in the lower tanks.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu Bwau Bau shju bYrwgu sdw ivgsMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Bhaau Bhau Sahaju Bairaagu Sadaa Vigasandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the gurmukh person in the love and fear of the Lord and observing indifference, full of equipoise remains delighted.

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn praupkwr krMdw ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Pooranu Paraoupakaaru Karandaa ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: Only perfect one undertakes altruism.

lines.gurmukhi: 3 kml qoN Alyp

Shabad OS B.translation: Detached like lotus

lines.gurmukhi: jl ivic kvlu Ailpqu hY sMg doK inrdoK rhMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Jal Vichi Kavalu Alipatu Hai Sang Dokh Niradokh Rahandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The lotus residing in water remains unsmeared by it.

lines.gurmukhi: rwqI Bvru luBwiedw sIqlu hoie sugMiD imlMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Raatee Bhavaru Loubhaaidaa Seetalu Hoi Sougandhi Miladaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the night it attracts the black bee which gets coolness and fragrance from lotus.

lines.gurmukhi: Blky sUrj iDAwnu Dir prPulqu hoie imlY hsMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Bhalakay Sooraj Dhiaanu Dhari Paraphulatu Hoi Milai Hasandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the morning it again meets the sun and being glad smiles the whole day.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK suK Pl shij Gr vrqmwn AMdir vrqMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukh Soukh Phul Sahaji Ghari Varatamaan Andari Varatandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs (like lotus) reside in the innate house of pleasure fruit and utilise the present time fully i.e. they don't sit idle.

lines.gurmukhi: lokwcwrI lok ivic vyd vIcwrI krm krMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Lokaachaaree Lok Vichi Vayd Veechaaree Karam Karandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: To the ordinary people busy in mundane affairs they look engrossed in the world, and, to the people pondering over Vedas they look engaged in rituals.

lines.gurmukhi: swvDwnu gur igAwn ivic jIvin mukiq jugiq ivcrMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Saavadhaanu Guragiaan Vichi Jeevani Moukati Jougati Vicharandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: But these gurmukhs, as a result of attaining knowledge from the Guru, keep consciousness in their possession and move in the world as liberated ones.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq guru sbdu vsMdw ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Guru Sabadu Vasandaa ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the congregation of the holy person resides the Guru-word.

lines.gurmukhi: 4 biR`C qoN smdrsI

Shabad OS B.translation: Impartial like tree

lines.gurmukhi: DrqI AMdir ibrKu hoie pihloN dy jV pYr itkweI
lines.transliteration_english: Dharatee Andari Birakhu Hoi Pahilon Day Jarh Pair Tikaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Tree grows on earth and first of all it sets its feet into the earth.

lines.gurmukhi: aupir JUlY Jtulw TMFI CwauN su QwauN suhweI
lines.transliteration_english: Oupari Jhoolai Jhatulaa Tdaddhee Chhaaoun Su Daaoun Suhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: People enjoy swinging over it and its cool shade adorns places.

lines.gurmukhi: pvxu pwxI pwlw shY isr qlvwieAw inhclu jweI
lines.transliteration_english: Pavanu Paanee Paalaa Sahai Sir Talavaaiaa Nihachalu Jaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: It bears the impact of air, water and cold but still keeping its head inverse, it remains steadfast at its place.

lines.gurmukhi: Pl dy vt vgwieAwN isir klvqu lY lohu qrweI
lines.transliteration_english: Phalu Day Vat Vagaaiaan Siri Kalavatu Lai Lohu Taraaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: When stoned, it gives fruit and even getting cut with the sawing machine it takes iron (in boats) across waters.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK jnmu skwrQw praupkwrI shij suBweI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Janamu Sakaaradaa Paraoupakaaree Sahaji Soubhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Life of gurmukhs is useful because by their natural temperament they are altruists.

lines.gurmukhi: imqR n sqR n mohu DRoh smdrsI gur sbd smweI
lines.transliteration_english: Mitr N Satr N Mohu Dhrohu Samadarasee Gur Sabadi Samaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: They have no friend or foe. Away from infatuation and delusion they are unbiased and immersed in the word of the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gurmiq vifAweI ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Guramati Vadiaaee ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: Their grandness they attain through the wisdom of the Guru and the company of the holy persons.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 mlwh qoN gurU dw rUpk

Shabad OS B.translation: True Guru is the boatman

lines.gurmukhi: swgr AMdir boihQw ivic muhwxw praupkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Saagar Andari Bohidaa Vichi Muhaanaa Paraoupakaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The vessel is in the ocean and there is a benevolent sailor in it.

lines.gurmukhi: Bwr AQrbx ldIAY lY vwpwru cVHin vwpwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaar Adaraban Ladeeai Lai Vaapaaru Charhhani Vaapaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The vessel is amply loaded and the traders get boarded thereon.

lines.gurmukhi: swier lhr n ivAwpeI Aiq Asgwh AQwh ApwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Saair Lahar N Viaapaee Ati Asagaah Adaah Apaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Waves of impassable ocean put no impact upon any one.

lines.gurmukhi: bwhly pUr lMGwiedw shI slwmiq pwir auqwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Bahalay Poor Laghaaidaa Sahee Salaamati Paari Outaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: That boatman takes the passengers across safe, dale and hearty. Those traders earn profits two or four times and gain in many ways.

lines.gurmukhi: dUxy cauxy dMm hon lwhw lY lY kwj svwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Doonay Chaounay Danm Hon Laahaa Lai Lai Kaaj Savaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs in the form of boatmen make people board the ship of holy congregation and take them across the impassable world-ocean.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK suK Plu swD sMig Bvjl AMdr duqru qwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukh Soukh Phalu Saadh Sangi Bhavajal Andar Doutaru Taaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Any liberated one alone can understand the mystery of the technique of the formless Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: jIvn mukiq jugiq inrMkwrI ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Jeevan Moukati Jougati Nirankaaree ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: Plant of sandal be becoming tree lives in the deep forests.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 bwvn cMdn qoN gurmuK

Shabad OS B.translation: From sandal to gurmukh

lines.gurmukhi: bwvn cMdn ibrKu hoie vxKMf AMdir vsY aujwVI
lines.transliteration_english: Baavan Chandan Birakhu Hoi Vanakhand Andari Vasai Ujaarhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Being near the vegetation, it keeps its head down and remains engrossed in meditation.

lines.gurmukhi: pwis invwsu vxwspiq inhclu lwie aurD qp qwVI
lines.transliteration_english: Paasi Nivaasu Vanaasapati Nihachalu Laai Uradh Tap Taarhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting attached to the moving breeze it spreads the superfine fragrance.

lines.gurmukhi: pvx gvx snbMDu kir gMD sugMD aulws auGwVI
lines.transliteration_english: Pavan Gavan Sanabandhu Kari Gandh Sougandh Ulaas Oughaarhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Whether with fruit or without fruit, all the trees are made fragrant by sandal tree.

lines.gurmukhi: APl sPl smdrs hoie kry vxspiq cMdn vwVI
lines.transliteration_english: Aphal Saphal Samadaras Hoi Karay Vanasapati Chandan Vaarhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the company of holy persons, which purifies the impure ones even in one day (sitting).

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu swD sMgu piqq punIq krY dyhwVI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadh Sangu Patit Pouneet Karai Dayhaarhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: It fills the evil persons with virtues and in its fold the people of fragile character become strong and firm.

lines.gurmukhi: Aaugux kIqy gux krY kc pkweI aupir vwVI
lines.transliteration_english: Aougoun Keetay Goun Karai Kach Pakaaee Oupari Vaarhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Neither water can drown nor fire can burn such people i.e. they go across the World Ocean and the flames of desires cannot reach them.

lines.gurmukhi: nIru n fobY Aig n swVI ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Neeru N Dobai Agi N Saarhee ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: Neither water can drown nor fire can burn such people i.e. they go across the World Ocean and the flames of desires cannot reach them.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 sUrj qoN gurmuK

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh benevolent like sun

lines.gurmukhi: rwiq AnHyrI AMDkwru lK kroVI cmkn qwry
lines.transliteration_english: Raati Anhayree Andhakaaru Lakh Karorhee Chamakan Taaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the dark night myriad stars shine.

lines.gurmukhi: Gr Gr dIvy bwlIAn pr Gr qkin cor ckwry
lines.transliteration_english: Ghar Ghar Deevay Baaleeani Par Ghar Takani Chor Chagaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: The houses are lit  by lighting the lamps but still the thieves also roam about for the purpose of stealing.

lines.gurmukhi: ht ptx GrbwrIAw dy dy qwk svin nr nwry
lines.transliteration_english: Hat Patan Gharabaareeaa Day Day Taak Savani Nar Naaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: The householders shut the doors of their homes and shops before they go to sleep.

lines.gurmukhi: sUrj joiq audoqu kir qwry qwir AnHyr invwry
lines.transliteration_english: Sooraj Joti Udotu Kari Taaray Taari Anhayr Nivaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: The sun with its light dispels the darkness of night.

lines.gurmukhi: bMDn mukiq krwiedw nwmu dwnu iesnwnu ivcwry
lines.transliteration_english: Bandhan Moukati Karaaidaa Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Vichaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Likewise the gurmukh making people understand the importance of nam (meditation), dan (charity), and isnan (ablution) sets them free from the bondage (of  life and death).

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu swDsMgu psU pryq piqq insqwry
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Pasoo Parayt Patit Nisataaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the company of holy persons through which animals, ghosts and the fallen ones are salvaged and liberated.

lines.gurmukhi: praupkwrI gurU ipAwry ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Paraoupakaaree Guroo Piaaray ?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such beneficent persons are dear to the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: 8 swD sMgq mwn srovr

Shabad OS B.translation: Manasarovar, the holy congregation

lines.gurmukhi: mwn srovru AwKIAY aupir hMs suvMs vsMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Maan Sarovaru Aakheeai Oupari Hans Suvans Vasanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: It is said that on Manasarovar (lake) resides swans of the highest breed.

lines.gurmukhi: moqI mwxk mwnsir cuix cuix hMs Amol cugMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Motee Maanak Maanasari Chouni Chouni Hans Amol Chouganday.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the Manasarovar are pearls and rubies and there invaluable jewels are picked up by swans to eat.

lines.gurmukhi: KIru nIru inrvwrdy lhrIN AMdir iPrin qrMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Kheeru Neeru Niravaaraday Lahareen Andari Dhirani Taranday.

Shabad OS B.translation: These swans separate water from milk and go on floating on the waves.

lines.gurmukhi: mwn srovru Cif kY horq Qwie n jwie bhMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Maan Sarovaru Chhadi Kai Horatu Daai N Jaai Bahanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Leaving Manasarovar, they go nowhere to sit or reside.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu swD sMgu prmhMs gur isK sohMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Param Hans Gurasikh Suohanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the congregation of holy persons wherein gurmukhs in the form of superior swans adorn the place.

lines.gurmukhi: iek min ieku iDAwiedy dUjy Bwie n jwie iPrMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Ik Mani Iku Dhiaaiday Doojay Bhaai N Jaai Dhiranday.

Shabad OS B.translation: With single-minded devotion they concentrate upon the Lord and do not go astray to any other thought.

lines.gurmukhi: sbdu suriq ilv AlK lKMdy ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadu Surati Liv Alakhu Lakhanday ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: Merging their consciousness into the Word they behold that imperceptible Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 gurmuK pwrs

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh is philosopher's stone

lines.gurmukhi: pwrsu pQru AwKIAY luikAw rhY n Awpu jxwey
lines.transliteration_english: Paarasu Padaru Aakheeai Loukiaa Rahai N Aapu Janaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Philosopher's stone remains hidden and does not publicise itself.

lines.gurmukhi: ivrlw koie is\\\\wxdw KojI Koij ley so pwey
lines.transliteration_english: Viralaa Koi Siaanadaa Khojee Khoji Laay So Paaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Any rare one identifies it and only a prospector gets it.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrsu pris Aprsu hoie AstDwqu iek Dwqu krwey
lines.transliteration_english: Paarasu Parasi Aparasu Hoi Asat Dhaatu Ik Dhaatu Karaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Touching that stone, the lowly metals transform into one metal, gold.

lines.gurmukhi: bwrh vMnI hoie kY kMcn muil Amuil ivkwey
lines.transliteration_english: Baarah Vannee Hoi Kai Kanchanu Muli Amuli Vikaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming pure gold those metals are sold as invaluable ones.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK suKPl swDsMg sbd suriq ilv AGV GVwey
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukhaphal Saadhasangu Sabad Surati Liv Agharh Gharhaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the holy congregation where merging consciousness into Word, the clumsy mind is chiselled into beautiful shape.

lines.gurmukhi: crix srix ilvlIn hoie sYNswrI inrMkwrI Bwey
lines.transliteration_english: Charani Sarani Liv Leenu Hoi Sainsaaree Nirankaaree Bhaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even a worldly person here, concentrating upon the feet of Guru, becomes dear to God, the formless One.

lines.gurmukhi: Gir bwrI hoie inj Gir jwey ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Ghari Baaree Hoi Nij Ghari Jaaay ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming householder, man resides in his innate nature (atman).

lines.gurmukhi: 10 gurmuK sB QoN au`cy hn

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs are the highest ones

lines.gurmukhi: icMqwmix icMqw hrY kwmDynu kwmnwN pujwey
lines.transliteration_english: Chintaamani Chintaa Harai Kaamadhaynu Kaamanaan Pujaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Chintamani alleviates anxieties and wish-fulfilling cow (kamadhena) fulfils all desires.

lines.gurmukhi: Pl Puil dyNdw pwrjwq iriD isiD iniD nv nwQ luBwey
lines.transliteration_english: Phal Phuli Dayndaa Paarajaatu Ridhi Sidhi Nav Naad Loubhaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Parijat tree gives flowers and fruits and the nine naths are engrossed with the miraculous powers.

lines.gurmukhi: ds Avqwr Akwr kir purKwrQ kir nwNv gxwey
lines.transliteration_english: Das Avataar Akaar Kari Purakhaarad Kari Naanv Ganaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The ten incarnations (of Hindu mythology) assumed human body and showed their valour to spread their names.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu swDsMgu cwir pdwrQ syvw lwey
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Chaari Padaarad Sayvaa Laaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is the holy congregation wherein all the four ideals of life (dharma, arth, kam and moks) serve themselves.

lines.gurmukhi: sbdu suriq ilv iprm rsu AkQ khwxI kQI n jwey
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadu Surati Liv Piram Rasu Akad Kahaanee Kadee N Jaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The consciousness of gurmukhs there remains merged in the Word and the story of their love is ineffable.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHm pUrn bHm Bgiq vCl huie ACl Clweyy
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabraham Pooran Braham Bhagati Vachhal Hui Achhal Chhalaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The transcendental Brahm is the perfect Brahm who by becoming affectionate to devotees puts many deceitful persons in the web of deception.

lines.gurmukhi: lyK AlyK n kImiq pwey ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Laykh Alaykh N Keemati Paaay ?10?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord is free from all accounts and none can understand His mystery.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 kwdr iprm ipAwlw

Shabad OS B.translation: Creator's cup of love

lines.gurmukhi: ieku kvwau pswau kir inrMkwir Awkwru bxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Kavaau Pasaau Kari Nirankaari Aakaaru Banaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: With a single Word that formless Lord created the whole world.

lines.gurmukhi: qoil Aqolu nw qolIAY quil n qulwDwir qolwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Toli Atolu N Toleeai Tuli N Tulaadhaari Tolaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Extension of the Lord (this world) can in no way be measured.

lines.gurmukhi: lyK AlyKu n ilKIAY AMg n AKru lyK ilKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Laykh Alaykhu N Likheeai Angu N Akharu Laykh Likhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By no account this world can be understood because all numerals and letters come to an end for this.

lines.gurmukhi: muil Amul n molIAY lK pdwrQ lvY n lwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Muli Amulu N Moleeai Lakhu Padaarad Lavai N Laaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Myriad kinds of its materials are invaluable; their price cannot be fixed.

lines.gurmukhi: boil Abol n bolIAY suix suix AwKxu AwiK suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Boli Abolu N Boleeai Souni Souni Aakhanu Aakhi Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even through speech, nothing can be said and heard about it.

lines.gurmukhi: Agmu AQwh AgwD boD AMqu n pwrwvwru n pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Agamu Adaahu Agaadhi Bodh Antu N Paaraavaaru N Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: This world in unapproachable, unfathomable and full of mystery; its mystique cannot be understood.

lines.gurmukhi: kudriq kIm n jwxIAY kyvfu kwdru ikqu Gir AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kudarati Keem N Jaaneeai Kayvadu Kaadaru Kitu Ghari Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: When it is impossible to understand the creation, how could its Creator's greatness and His residence be known?

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPlu swDsMgu sbdu suriq ilv AlK lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasangu Sabadu Surati Liv Alakh Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the holy congregation where by merging the consciousness in the Word that invisible Lord is visualised.

lines.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw Ajru jrwieAw ]11]
lines.transliteration_english: Piram Piaalaa Ajaru Jaraaiaa ?11?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation, the unbreakable cup of love is drunk by becoming tolerant.

lines.gurmukhi: 12 swD sMgq s`cKMf

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy Congregation, the abode of truth

lines.gurmukhi: swdhu sbdhu bwhrw AkQ kQw ikauN ijhbw jwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadahu Sabadahu Baaharaa Akad Kadaa Kioun Jihabaa Jaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord is beyond taste and words; how can His ineffable story be told by tongue?

lines.gurmukhi: ausqiq inMdw bwhrw kQnI bdnI ivic n AwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Ousatati Nidaa Baaharaa Kadanee Badanee Vichi N Aanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: He being beyond praise and slander does not come in the periphery of telling and hearing.

lines.gurmukhi: gMD sprs Agocrw nws sws hyriq hYrwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Gandh Saparasu Agocharaa Naas Saas Hayrati Hairaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is beyond smell and touch and the nose, and the breath is also wonder-struck but cannot know Him.

lines.gurmukhi: vrnhu ichnhu bwhrw idsit Aidsit n iDAwnu iD|wxY
lines.transliteration_english: Varanahu Chihanahu Baaharaa Disati Adisati N Dhiaanu Dhiaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is away from any varna and symbolism and is even beyond the sight of concentration.

lines.gurmukhi: inrwlMbu AvlMb ivxu Driq Agwis invwsu ivfwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Niraalabu Avalab Vinu Dharati Agaasi Nivaasu Vidaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Without any prop He resides in the grandeur of earth and sky.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq scKMif hY inrMkwru gur sbdu is\\\\wxY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Sachakhandi Hai Nirankaaru Gur Sabadu Siaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy congregation is the abode of truth where through the word of the Guru, the formless Lord is recognised.

lines.gurmukhi: kudriq kwdr noN kurbwxY ]12]
lines.transliteration_english: Kudarati Kaadar No Kurabaanai ?12?

Shabad OS B.translation: Whole of this creation is sacrifice unto the creator.

lines.gurmukhi: 13 gurmuKwN dw s`cw rsqw

Shabad OS B.translation: The true way of gurmukhs

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pMQu AgMmu hY ijau jl AMdir mInu clMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Pandu Aganm Hai Jiu Jal Andari Meenu Chaladaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As the path of fish in water is unknowable, the way of gurmukhs is also unapproachable.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK Koju AlKu hY ijau pMKI Awgws aufMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Khoju Alakhu Hai Jiu Pankhee Aagaas Udandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As the path of birds flying in the sky cannot be known, the thoughtful and search-orientated way of gurmukh is also imperceptible. It cannot be understood.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq rhrwis hY hir cMdaurI ngru vsMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Raharaasi Hai Hari Chandauree Nagaru Vasandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy congregation is the straight path for gurmukhs and this world is full of illusions for them.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn qMbol rsu iprm ipAwlY rMgu cVMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Tanbol Rasu Piram Piaalai Rangu Charandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As the four colours of betel catechu, betelnut, lime and betel lead become one (red) colour (of joy-giving love), the gurmukhs also enjoy the cup of the Lord's love.

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilv lIxu hoie cMdn vws invws krMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Liv Leenu Hoi Chandan Vaas Nivaas Karandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As the fragrance of sandal comes to reside in other plants, they merging their consciousness into Word reside in the hearts of others.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwnu iDAwnu ismrxu jugiq kUMij kUrm hMs vMs vDMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Giaanu Dhiaanu Simaranu Jougati Koonji Kooram Hans Vans Vadhandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By means of knowledge, meditation and remembrance, they like cranes, tortoise and swans expand their family or tradition.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu AlKu lKMdw ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Alakh Lakhandaa ?13?

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs come face to face with God, the pleasure of all fruits.

lines.gurmukhi: 14 eISÍr Al`K hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord is imperceptible

lines.gurmukhi: bHmwidk vydw sxY nyiq nyiq kir Bydu n pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Brahamaadik Vaydaan Sanai Nayti Nayti Kari Bhaydu N Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Brahmas alongwith the Vedas have declared Him this is not, this is not (neti neti) and these all could not known His mystery.

lines.gurmukhi: mhwdyv AvDUq hoie nmo nmo kir iDAwn n AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Mahaadayv Avadhootu Hoi Namo Namo Kari Dhiaani N Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By becoming avadhut (a kind of superior yogi), Madadev also recited his name but his meditation could not attain him.

lines.gurmukhi: ds Avqwr Akwru kir eykMkwr n AlKu lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Das Avataar Akaaru Kari Aykankaaru N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Ten incarnations also flourished but none could perceive ekhankar, the supreme Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: iriD isiD iniD nwQ nau Awid purKu Awdys krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Naad Nau Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Nine naths, the treasures of miraculous powers, also bowed before that Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: shs nwv lY shs muK ismrix sMK n nwau iDAwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sahas Naanv Lai Sahas Moukh Simarani Sankh N Naaoun Dhiaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sesang (mythical snake) with its thousand mouths remembered Him by thousands of names, but its recitation could not be accomplished.

lines.gurmukhi: loms qpu kir swDnw haumY swiD n swDu sdwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Lomas Tapu Kari Saadhanaa Haoumai Saadhi N Saadhu Sadaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sage Lomas rigorously undertook ascetic discipline but could not overcome his ego and could not be called a true ascetic.

lines.gurmukhi: icr jIvxu bhu hMFxw gurmuiK suK Plu plu n cKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chiru Jeevanu Bahu Handdhanaa Guramoukhi Soukhu Phalu Palu N Chakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Ever-living Markandey spent a long life but could not taste the pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: kudriq AMdir Brim BulwieAw ]14]
lines.transliteration_english: Kudarati Andari Bharami Bhulaaiaa ?14?

Shabad OS B.translation: All mentioned above remained deluded while living on earth.

lines.gurmukhi: 15 AMjn ivc inrMjn pwnw

Shabad OS B.translation: Attainment of Lord amidst maya

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPl swDsMgu BgiqvCl hoie visgq AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukhaphalu Saadhasangu Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Vasigati Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is holy congregation and controlled by this holy congregation, the Lord comes here as lover of the devotees.

lines.gurmukhi: kwrx krqy vis hY swDsMgiq ivic kry krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaaranu Karatay Vasi Hai Saadhasangati Vichi Karay Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the causes are under control of the creator but in the holy congregation He does everything in accordance with the wishes of the devotees and the saints.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHm pUrn bHm swDsMgiq ivic Bwxw BwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahamu Saadhasangati Vichi Bhaanaa Bhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The transcendetal Brahm is the perfect Brahm and He likes the will of the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: rom rom ivic riKEnu kir bHmMf kroiV smwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Brahamand Karorhi Samaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In his every trichome are absorbed crores of universes.

lines.gurmukhi: bIAhu kir ibsQwr vVu Pl AMdir iPir bIau vswieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Beeahu Kari Bisadaaru Varhu Phal Andari Dhiri Beeu Vasaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From one seed comes out banyan tree and in its fruits again the seeds reside.

lines.gurmukhi: Aipau pIAxu Ajru jrxu Awpu gvwie n Awpu jxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Apiu Peeanu Ajur Jaranu Aapu Gavaai N Aapu Janaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Who quaffing the nectar have devotedly adopted the unbearable in their mind, the eschewing their ego have never made themselves noticed.

lines.gurmukhi: AMjnu ivic inrMjnu pwieAw ]15]
lines.transliteration_english: Anjanu Vichi Niranjanu Paaiaa ?15?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such true persons while being amidst maya have attained that immaculate Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 16 vwihgurU pry qoN pry hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Waheguru, the wondrous Lord is beond all limits

lines.gurmukhi: mihmw mih mihkwr ivic mihmw lK n mihmw jwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Mahimaa Mahi Mahikaar Vichi Mahimaa Lakh N Mahimaa Jaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even the people spreading the fragrance of His grandeur don’t understand the real nature of His greatness.

lines.gurmukhi: lK mhwqm mhwqmwN iql n mhwqmu AwiK vKwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Mahaatam Mahaatamaa Til N Mahaatamu Aakhi Vakhaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lakhs of saint explain the gist and significance of that Lord but even all joined could not put forth even a fraction of His grandeur.

lines.gurmukhi: ausqiq ivic lK ausqqI pl ausqiq AMdir hYrwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Ousatati Vichi Lakh Ousatatee Pal Ousatati Andari Hairaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Myriad eulogists are wonder struck (because they could not eulogise Him properly)

lines.gurmukhi: Acrj ivic lK Acrjw Acrj Acrj coj ivfwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Acharaj Vichi Lakh Acharajaa Acharaj Acharaj Choj Vidaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of wonders are full of wonder and they are further surprised to see the awe-inspiring feats of the Lord, the all wonder Himself.

lines.gurmukhi: ivsmwdI ivsmwd lK ivsmwdhu ivsmwd ivhwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Visamaadee Visamaad Lakh Visamaadahu Visamaad Vihaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Looking at the completeness of the wonder of that wondrous Lord, the elation feels elated and exhausted.

lines.gurmukhi: Abgiq giq Aiq Agm hY AkQ kQw AwKwx vKwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Abagati Gati Ati Agam Hai Akad Kadaa Aakhaan Vakhaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The dynamism of that unmanifest Lord is extremely unapproachable and even a shirt account of His grand story is ineffable.

lines.gurmukhi: lK prvwx prY prvwxY ]16]
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Paravaan Parai Paravaanai ?16?

Shabad OS B.translation: His measurement is beyond lacs of measures.

lines.gurmukhi: 17 vwihgurU pry qoN pry hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Waheguru, the wondrous Lord is beond all limits

lines.gurmukhi: Agmhu Aghu AgMm hY Agmu Agmu Aiq Agmu suxwey
lines.transliteration_english: Agamahu Agamu Aganmu Hai Agamu Agamu Ati Agamu Sounaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord is beyond accessibility and all call Him extremely inaccessible.

lines.gurmukhi: AlKhu AlKu AlKu hY AlKu AlKu lK AlKu iDAwey
lines.transliteration_english: Alakhahu Alakhu Alakhu Hai Alakhu Alakhu Lakh Alakhu Dhiaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He was imperceptible; He is imperceptible and will remain inaccessible i.e. He is beyond all meditations.

lines.gurmukhi: AprMpru AprMprhuN AprMpru AprMpru Bwey
lines.transliteration_english: Aparanparu Aparanparahu Aparanparu Aparanparu Bhaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Beyond all limits whatsoever is illimitable; the Lord is beyond imagination.

lines.gurmukhi: Awgocr AwgocrhuN Awgocr Awgocir jwey
lines.transliteration_english: Aagocharu Aagocharahu Aagocharu Aagochari Jaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is imperceptible of the imperceptibles and is beyond the reach of sense organs.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHm pUrn bHm swDsMgiq AwgwiD Alwey
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahamu Saadhasangati Aagaadhi Alaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The transcendental Brahm is the perfect Brahm who is eulogised in the holy congregation in many ways.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPlu iprm rsu Bgiq vClu hoie ACl Clwey
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Achhalu Chhalaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The joy of His love is the pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs. The Lord is loving to devotees but is never deluded even by the biggest cheats

lines.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh cVHwau cVHwey ]17]
lines.transliteration_english: Veeh Ikeeh Charhhaau Charhhaaay ?17?

Shabad OS B.translation: By his grace alone, one can go across the World Ocean enthusiastically.

lines.gurmukhi: 18 prmySur dw lKwauxw

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru has shown the imperceptible

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHmu pUrn bHmu inrMkwir Awkwru bxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahamu Nirankaari Aakaaru Banaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The transecental Brahm is the perfect Brahm and that very formless (Lord) has created all the forms of universe.

lines.gurmukhi: Aibgiq giq AwgwiD boD gur mUriq huie AlKu lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Abigati Gati Aagaadhi Bodh Gur Moorit Hoi Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is ummanifest, unfathomable and imperceptible for intellect, but Guru, the icon of beauty, has made me behold the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq scKMf ivic Bgiq vCl hoie ACl ClwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Sachakhand Vichi Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Achhal Chhalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In holy congregation, the abode of the truth, He emerges as tender towards devotees and deludes even those who never get deluded.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrin iek vrn huie Awid purK Awdysu krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Ik Varan Hui Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Guru alone unites all the four varnas to make them one and further makes them bow before the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: iDAwn mUl drsnu gurU iCA drsn drsn ivic AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Dhiaan Moolu Darasanu Guroo Chhia Darasan Darasan Vichi Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: At the base of all ascetic disciplines is the philosophy of the Guru in which all the six philosophies  (of Indian tradition) get subsumed.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpy Awip n Awpu jxwieAw ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Aapay Aapi N Aapu Janaaiaa ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: He himself is everything but never makes Himself noticed by anyone.

lines.gurmukhi: 19 gurU dI Srx

Shabad OS B.translation: The shelter of the Guru

lines.gurmukhi: crx kvl srxwgqI swDsMgiq imil guru isK Awey
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kaval Saranaagatee Saadhasangati Mili Guru Sikh Aaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation, the disciples of the Guru come in the shelter of the holy feet of the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: AMmiRq idsit inhwlu kir idb diRsit dy pYrI pwey
lines.transliteration_english: Anmrit Disati Nihaalu Kari Dib Drisati Day Pairee Paaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The nectar like sight of the Guru has blest one and all and due to his divine look, the Guru has put them all at the holy feet (shelter) i.e. they all have been made humble.

lines.gurmukhi: crx ryxu msqik iqlk Brm krm dw lyKu imtwey
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Raynu Masataki Tilak Bharam Karam Daa Laykhu Mitaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikhs applied the dust of the feet to their forehead and now their account of delusive actions has been erased.

lines.gurmukhi: crxodk lY Awcmnu haumY duibDw rogu gvwey
lines.transliteration_english: Charanodaku Lai Aachamanu Haoumai Doubidhaa Rogu Gavaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: After drinking the nectar of feet, their maladies of ego and duality have been cured.

lines.gurmukhi: pYrIN pY pwKwku hoie jIvn mukiq shj Gir Awey
lines.transliteration_english: Paireen Pai Paa Khaaku Hoi Jeevan Moukati Sahaj Ghari Aaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Falling at the feet, becoming the dust of feet and adopting the way of liberated ones in life they have established themselves in equipoise.

lines.gurmukhi: crx kvl ivic Bvr hoie suK sMpt mkrMd luBwey
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kaval Vichi Bhavar Hoi Soukh Sanpad Makarandi Loubhaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Now having become the black bees of the lotus feet, they are enjoying the nectar of pleasure and delight.

lines.gurmukhi: pUj mUl siqguru crx duqIAw nwsiq lvY n lwey
lines.transliteration_english: Pooj Mool Satiguru Charan Douteeaa Naasati Lavai N Laaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The base of worship with them are the lotus feet of the true Guru and they do not allow duality to come near them now.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu gur srxwey ]19]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Gur Saranaaay ?19?

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is the shelter of the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: 20 gur ivSyKqw vrxn

Shabad OS B.translation: Greatness of the  trueGuru

lines.gurmukhi: swsqR isMmiRq vyd lK mhwNBwrQ rwmwiex myly
lines.transliteration_english: Saasatr Sinmriti Vayd Lakh Mahaan Bhaarad Raamaain Maylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even if Shastras, Smritis, Lakhs of Vedas, Mahabharat, Ramayan etc. are joined together;

lines.gurmukhi: swr gIqw lK Bwgvq joqk vYd clMqI Kyly
lines.transliteration_english: Saar Geetaa Lakh Bhaagavat Jotak Vaid Chalatee Khaylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Thousands of gists of the Gita, Bhagvats, books of astronomy and acrobats of physicians are joined;

lines.gurmukhi: caudh ividAw swAMgIq bHmy ibsn mhysur Byly
lines.transliteration_english: Chaudah Vidiaa Saaangeet Brahamay Bisan Mahaysur Bhaylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Fourteen branches of education, musicology and Brahma, Visnu, Mahesa are put together;

lines.gurmukhi: snkwidk lK nwrdw suk ibAws lK syK nvyly
lines.transliteration_english: Sanakaadik Lakh Naaradaa Souk Biaas Lakh Saykh Navaylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: If Lakhs of ses, serpent, Sukr, Vyas, Narad, Sanal et al. are all collected there;

lines.gurmukhi: igAwn iDAwn ismrx Gxy drsn vrn gurU bhu cyly
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Dhiaan Simaran Ghanay Darasan Varan Guroo Bahu Chaylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Myriad's of knowledge's, meditations, recitations, philosophies, varnas and guru-disciples are there; they all are nothing.

lines.gurmukhi: pUrw siqgur gurwN guru mMqR mUl gur bcn suhyly
lines.transliteration_english: Pooraa Satigur Guraan Guru Mantr Mool Gur Bachan Suhaylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The perfect Guru (Lord) is the Guru of the gurus and the holy discourse of the Guru is the basis of all the mantras.

lines.gurmukhi: AkQ kQw guru sbdu hY nyiq nyiq nmo nmo kyly
lines.transliteration_english: Akad Kadaa Guru Sabadu Hai Nayti Nayti Namo Namo Kaylay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The tale of the Word of the Guru is ineffable; it is neti neti (not this not this). One should always bow before him.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK suK Plu AMmiRq vyly ]20]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukh Soukh Phalu Anmrit Vaylay ?20?

Shabad OS B.translation: This pleasure fruit of the gurmukhs is attained in the early ambrosial hours.

lines.gurmukhi: 21 gurU qu`l kuC nhIN hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Nothing is there equal to Guru

lines.gurmukhi: cwr pdwrQ AwKIAin lK pdwrQ hukmI bMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Chaar Padaarad Aakheeani Lakh Padaarad Houkamee Banday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Four ideals (dharma arth kam and moks) are said to be but such millions of ideals are servants (of Lord, the Guru).

lines.gurmukhi: iriD isiD iniD lK syvkI kwmDyxu lK vg crMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Lakh Sayvakee Kaamadhaynu Lakh Vag Charanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: In His service are millions of miraculous powers and treasures and He has herds of wish fulfilling cows grazing there.

lines.gurmukhi: lK pwrs pQrolIAw pwrjwq lK bwg PlMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Paaras Padaroleeaa Paarajaati Lakh Baag Phaladay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He has lakhs of philosopher's stones and gardens of fruitful wish fulfilling trees.

lines.gurmukhi: icqvx lK icMqwmxI lK rswiex krdy CMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Chitavan Lakh Chintaamanee Lakh Rasaain Karaday Chhanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: At one wink of the Guru, lakhs of wish fulfilling gems (chintamini) and elixirs are sacrifice unto Him.

lines.gurmukhi: lK rqn rqnwgrwN sB inDwn sB Pl ismrMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Ratan Ratanaagaraa Sabh Nidhaan Sabh Phal Simaranday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of jewels, all the treasures of oceans and all the fruits recite his praises.

lines.gurmukhi: lK BgqI lK Bgq hoie krwmwq prcY prcMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Bhagatee Lakh Bhagat Hoi Karaamaat Parachai Parachanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of devotees and miracle mongers move around engrossed in hypocrisies.

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilv swDsMgu iprm ipAwlw Ajru jrMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangu Piram Piaalaa Ajaru Jaranday.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true disciple of the Guru, merging their consciousness in the Word, drinks and assimilates the unbearable cup of the love of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: gur ikrpw sqsMig imlMdy ]21]14]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Kirapaa Satasangi Miladay ?21?16?solaan?

Shabad OS B.translation: By the grace of the Guru, people come and join the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: <> siqgur pRswid ]
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realised through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: aulit pvn mn mIn kI cpl giq siqgur prcy prmpd pwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ulati Pavan Man Meen Kee Chapal Gati , Satigur Parachay Paramapad Paaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By practicing Naam Simran (meditation on Lord's name) one can turn the wind-like wayward mind into sharp and swift movement of fish. Developing association with the word of True Guru, one attains noble state.

lines.gurmukhi: sUr sr soiK poiK som sr pUrn kY bMDn dy miRq sr ApIA ipAwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Soor Sar Sokhi Pokhi Som Sar Pooran Kai , Bandhan Day Mrit Sar Apeea Piaaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Nectar of life (blissful peace) is obtained only by meditation. By burning away the indestructible ego and by killing the imperishable mind, leaving all doubts and suspicions, those who stabilise their body, their life-force finds a direction.

lines.gurmukhi: Ajrih jwir mwir Amrih BRwiq Cwif AsiQr kMD hMs Anq n Dwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ajarahi Jaari Maari Amarahi Bhraati Chhaadi , Asadir Kandh Hans Anat N Dhaaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By burning away the indestructible ego and by killing the imperishable mind, leaving all doubts and suspicions, those who stabilise their body, their life-force finds a direction.

lines.gurmukhi: AwdY Awd nwdY nwd sllY sill imil bHmY bHm imil shj smwey hY ]16]
lines.transliteration_english: Aadai Aad Naadai Naad Salalai Salil Mili , Brahamai Braham Mili Sahaj Samaaay Hai ?16?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the space merges with space, air with air and water mixes up with its source, so does the life-force integrates with the radiance of the Lord and supreme bliss is experienced. (16)
